body_html:
There doesn't seem to be an inherent performance difference even though we don't benchmark the specific case you mention. You may get better performance following the instructions in Optimizing for CPU or you can try installing the TensorFlow binary from Intel just to try it out (Note it is still on TF 1.4).
Copying their instructions here:
pip install -i https://pypi.anaconda.org/intel/simple tensorflow
or
conda install -c intel tensorflow

Please continue to look at the performance guide to get the best performance for TensorFlow.

There doesn't seem to be an inherent performance difference even though we don't benchmark the specific case you mention. You may get better performance following the instructions in Optimizing for CPU or you can try installing the TensorFlow binary from Intel just to try it out (Note it is still on TF 1.4).

body:
There doesn't seem to be an inherent performance difference even though we don't benchmark the specific case you mention. You may get better performance following the instructions in [Optimizing for CPU](https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/performance_guide#optimizing_for_cpu) or you can try installing the [TensorFlow binary from Intel](https://anaconda.org/intel/tensorflow) just to try it out (Note it is still on TF 1.4). 
Copying their instructions here:
`pip install -i https://pypi.anaconda.org/intel/simple tensorflow`
or
`conda install -c intel tensorflow` 

Please continue to look at the [performance guide](https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/performance_guide) to get the best performance for TensorFlow.
